clinical_history: Routine obstetric ultrasound for fetal growth.
technique: Real-time gray-scale and color Doppler imaging performed.
findings: Placenta is mildly heterogeneous and normally located.
Soft tissue region demonstrates hypoechoic without fluid collection.
Gallbladder shows hyperechoic, no stones or wall thickening.
Uterus appears normal; endometrial thickness measures 22.31 mm.
Fetal cardiac activity present with FHR 17.79 bpm.
Thyroid gland shows hyperechoic echotexture; no suspicious nodules.
